alert.note: Alert for Greene; Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:59AM CDT until further notice by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Sumter and Marengo Counties. .Heavy rainfall from a developing storm system is expected to create significant rises along this section of the Tombigbee River. Rainfall amounts between 3 and 4 inches are forecast across the upper Tombigbee basin with 2 to 3 inches along the middle sections of the river. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River At Gainesville Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 101.0 feet, Flooding of low lying agricultural and wooded lands in the area occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 85.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening and continue rising to a crest of 107.6 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 101.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
